title: GOLD COAST SUBLEASE
posting_body: A convertible at Old town Park tower 3.
There’s 2 pools, a hot tub, gym, sauna, bowling alley and much more.
You won’t be paying me you will be paying the building and taking over my lease so there is a credit check.
$2155 after utilities the price is firm no changing.
You can renew the lease for the same price if wanted.
The unit will be COMPLETELY empty.
I have furniture you can buy if you want if not.
